document_data.name: Delitar
document_data.mainbody: '''Delitar the Slow''' was a historian working in [[Westgate]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was considered by many to be the greatest [[human]] historian in the Realms in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Description: His nickname derived from his very slow speech, the result of a verbal stutter. It could take a long time for him to tell a story, and some believed it meant he was slow of mind as well, but this was far from the truth.
document_data.Activities:
Delitar was one of the most respected historians of the [[Realms]], and was quoted by many sages. He had three subservient sages specializing in regional history and many scribes that worked under him. 

[[Artides]], the [[rock gnome]] historian, studied under Delitar during his teenage years.{{Cite dungeon/69/Sleep of Ages|68}}
